summary: Tested new ERP features: PDF Export IRES/IRAP, Dashboard Widget IRES/IRAP, GestioneDipendenti tabs fix, RegoleCategorizzazione inline editing. All 23 backend tests passed. All frontend features verified working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features working correctly. PDF export generates valid PDF files. IRES/IRAP calculations use Campania region with 4.97% IRAP aliquota. GestioneDipendenti tabs have z-index fix applied and all 5 tabs are clickable.

pdf_export.details: Returns valid PDF file (starts with %PDF-1.4), ~4.7KB size, correct content-type

ires_irap_calculation.details: Returns correct structure with utile_civilistico, ires, irap, totale_imposte. Campania aliquota 4.97% verified.

dashboard_widget.details: Widget shows Utile Civilistico, IRES Dovuta (24%), IRAP Dovuta, TOTALE IMPOSTE, Aliquota effettiva, Variazioni fiscali

quick_actions.details: Links to /contabilita and /regole-categorizzazione present and working

gestione_dipendenti_tabs.details: All 5 tabs clickable: Anagrafica, Contratti, Prima Nota, Libro Unico, Libretti Sanitari. z-index fix applied (position: relative, zIndex: 10)

regole_categorizzazione.details: 3 tabs working (Fornitori, Descrizioni, Categorie), Excel download/upload, inline editing with pencil icon

api_tests_summary.TestPDFExport: 4/4 passed - PDF export returns 200, correct content-type, valid PDF, works with different regions
api_tests_summary.TestCalcoloImposte: 6/6 passed - Returns correct structure, IRES/IRAP sections, Campania aliquota 4.97%, totale consistency
api_tests_summary.TestDashboardEndpoints: 2/2 passed - Dashboard summary and health endpoints
api_tests_summary.TestRegoleCategorizzazione: 4/4 passed - Get regole, structure, Excel download valid XLSX
